title: SCP-166 | SCP-8817 _Artwork
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:space]]

+ **SCP-166**

[[collapsible show="✦ Close your eyes." hide="✦ Do you want to wake up?"]]
[[include component:image-block
|name=SCP-166.png
|caption=**We Can Only Reminisce**
|width=80%
|align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]
    
[[collapsible show="✦ Look into the telescope?" hide="✦ The recollection of moondust swirls and twirls, creating a blurry trace of words."]]
> This must be a dream.
>  
> A dream about a long-lost past, memories, and people you adored.
> 
> You know that one day you will wake up eventually. But when you are here, will you savor the last moment of bittersweet?
> 
> This is about an era that has slipped away.
[[/collapsible]]
     
[[collapsible show="✦ Find the source of the Astronomy Phenomena?" hide="✦ SCP-166"]]
[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-166]]]
[[/collapsible]]
-----
+ **SCP-8817**

[[collapsible show="✦ Embrace the void?" hide="✦ Keep dreaming?"]]
[[include component:image-block
|name=8817.PNG
|caption=**Descending, Ascending.**
|width=80%
|align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]
    
[[collapsible show="✦ Look into the telescope?" hide="✦ You see words floating, shimmering on the surface of the Moon."]]
> When you embrace the void, the void hugs you back.
>  
>  Maybe this is the end.
> 
> But this could be a new beginning. Sometimes, you think you are descending, but you are also ascending.
[[/collapsible]]
     
[[collapsible show="✦ Find the source of the Astronomy Phenomena?" hide="✦ SCP-8817"]]
[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8817]]]
[[/collapsible]]
-----
> [[size larger]]**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:a-shining-moon-s-observatory Enter the Observatory?]**[[/size]]
